pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Passive$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() $(e)Plains$(). $(6)Overworld().$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() 1-3 $(item)Raw Venison$(), 1-3 $(item)Cooked Venison$() if killed with fire, 1-4 $(item)Leather$()

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Gazelles are adorable mobs that wander the plains of the world. They don’t attack anyone. And simply wander the world. Don’t they look adorable? Look at them! Small posture, little head, and ears that twitch! What’s not to love about them?
